actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution providing for the expenses of the investigation and studies by the Committee on Small Business.

summary.text: Authorizes funds for the further expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the House Committee on Small Business not to exceed $163,000. Declares that no part of these funds shall be available for expenditure in connection with an investigation of any subject being investigated by any other House committee.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the expenses of the investigation and studies by the Committee on Small Business.
